Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to amending the taxicab passengers’ bill of rights.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Amending the taxicab passengers’ bill of rights.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to reporting of overcharge complaints and enforcement actions by the taxi and limousine commission.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reporting of overcharge complaints and enforcement actions by the taxi and limousine commission.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the taxi and limousine commission advisory board.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: The taxi and limousine commission advisory board.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to certain information to be collected by taxicab equipment and that such information be shared with the taxi and limousine commission upon request.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Certain information to be collected by taxicab equipment and that such information be shared with the taxi and limousine commission upon request.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to fees for the inspection of taxicabs by the taxi and limousine commission.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Fees for the inspection of taxicabs by the taxi and limousine commission.
